required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Impact of Lifestyle Changes on Non-COVID Deaths
clinical_study.official_title: The Impact of Lifestyle Alteration by Strict Prevention Measures on Non-COVID Deaths in the Region With Low COVID-19 Transmission Rate

lead_sponsor.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

clinical_study.source: The First Affiliated Hospital with Nanjing Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The increase of all-cause mortality in the areas with high COVID-19 transmission rate due to COVID-19 deaths and the collateral damage to other healthcare problems is well known. However, the COVID-19 mortality is very low in the regions with low transmission rate and sufficient medical resources. In such regions, strict prevention measures were taken and these would alter the people's lifestyle and hygienic habits and further impact on non-COVID-19 deaths. Yet, there has no thorough investigation in this aspect.

detailed_description.textblock:
Background The increase of all-cause mortality in the areas with high COVID-19 transmission rate due to COVID-19 deaths and the collateral damage to other healthcare problems is well known. However, the COVID-19 mortality is very low in the regions with low transmission rate and sufficient medical resources. In such regions, strict prevention measures were taken and these would alter the people's lifestyle and hygienic habits and further impact on non-COVID-19 deaths. Yet, there has no thorough investigation in this aspect.
Methods The number of registered deaths among 8.8 million permanent residents with specific causes from January 2018 to June 2020 were sourced from the Xuzhou Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jiangsu Province, China. Death rates were calculated and compared by weeks, months, and years with a focus on the period of COVID-19 pandemic from Jan 24 to March 27, 2020. Numeric values of all-cause death and the death rates of non-COVID diseases were compared in time series at different time scales.

primary_outcome.measure: Numeric values of all-cause death and the death rates of non-COVID diseases

study_pop.textblock: all cases of non-Covid-19 deaths in Xuzhou region between 2018 and 2020

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All cases of death reported to the Xuzhou CDC during the study period
Exclusion Criteria:
- no
